events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it arrived the wrong size and I want to get a refund for it as soon as possible.
The system detected keywords indicating a refund request related to a wrong sized jacket delivery.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to assist the customer with their refund request.
Hello! I’m Emily from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the size you received versus the size you ordered?
Thanks for your quick reply. My order number is 123456789. I ordered a medium but received a large instead.
We can process a full refund once you return the incorrect jacket. I will email you the return label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for making this easy. I will send the jacket back tomorrow.
We received your returned jacket and have processed your refund. You should see the amount credited within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure that you have received your refund and are satisfied with how we handled your case.
Thank you for contacting support. Your refund case is now closed. We hope to serve you better next time.
